item.title: Charlotte's Premier Historical City Tour on Eco- Friendly Cart
item.description: Explore Charlotte aboard a 7-person golf cart, on this small-group tour of the area. With a local guide at the wheel, visit popular landmarks like the NASCAR Hall of Fame, the Discovery Place, the Mint Museum, the Imaginon and Levine Museum of the New South, and more. Visit all of Charlotte's historical sites, as well some of the more modern, popular areas in the city.

image.alt: Charlotte's Premier Historical City Tour on Eco- Friendly Cart

item.title: Charlotte's Ultimate Southern Charm Historical City Cart Tour
item.description:
Smooth, extra cushion, new golf carts Discounted parking when available. The TRUE Southern Charm Rides tour! Kids 0-4 FREE!!!! Will use Southern Charm bus for extreme temps/weather.
Tours leave promptly!
Take a 5-star/award winning tour deep into our history on luxurious limo golf carts to see why people are saying Southern Charm Rides is #1 historical tour in Charlotte, southern hospitality, food discount, stop for pictures. We give historical information dating back to the 1700s. Learn where Elvis performed, the name Queen City, Fourth Ward neighborhood, gold mines, tales of the cities' history, “medicine man,” first hospital, the Bootlegger house, etc.
For sports fans, Bank of America Stadium, Truist Ball Field, NASCAR Hall of Fame, etc
We travel down the main street showing you art, museums, and many landmarks.
Don’t just take our word for it, read our reviews! Our tours have been the highlight of the trip for many travelers. Also, see Southern Charm Haunted/true crime tour!

image.alt: Charlotte's Ultimate Southern Charm Historical City Cart Tour

item.title: 90 Minute Historic Uptown Neighborhood Segway Tour of Charlotte
item.description: A Segway tour of Charlotte is fun, safe and informative! Follow your knowledgeable local guide as you glide through the upbeat Uptown neighborhood. Sights on this tour include the Bechtler Museum of Modern Art, the Mint Museum, and the Gantt Center. Choose a 1.5-hour ride, or add an extra 30 minutes to see a couple of additional sights: two historic cemeteries and the stadium home of the Carolina Panthers.

image.alt: 90 Minute Historic Uptown Neighborhood Segway Tour of Charlotte

item.title: Charlotte Comedy City Tour
item.description: Board the funny bus to explore Charlotte’s most interesting neighborhoods, historic places, and landmarks on an adults-only comedy tour with hilarious live commentary. Enjoy BYO beer and wine as you ride through town, and get a funny, local perspective on life in the city. Kick off your evening in Charlotte by laughing along with a friendly crowd of visitors and locals. Take in the sights at night and experience a one-of-a-kind mashup of history and comedy with tickets to Charlotte’s funniest tour.

image.alt: Charlotte Comedy City Tour

item.title: Carolina History and Haunts Charlotte Historical Ghost Walking Tour
item.description: See Charlotte’s most historic and haunted places with a 1.5-hour walking tour through the Fourth Ward. Follow your experienced guide to the city’s most infamous landmarks, where locals have spotted ghosts for centuries. Hear about Charlotte’s ancient Indian trading path and revolutionary battles, and learn the secrets behind uptown’s spookiest mansions. Watch for theatrical ghosts, medical ghosts, famous ghosts and unknown ghosts as you explore Charlotte’s best preserved historical neighborhood.

image.alt: Carolina History and Haunts Charlotte Historical Ghost Walking Tour

item.title: UPTOWN FUNK: 1 Hour Guided City Walking Tour in Charlotte
item.description: Walk through the heart of Charlotte with a guide who really knows their stuff. Whether you’re a new arrival looking to settle into the city or a tourist visiting for the first time, this tour has plenty to offer. You’ll learn facts about Charlotte’s past and present while you take in the sights of the city center.

image.alt: UPTOWN FUNK: 1 Hour Guided City Walking Tour in Charlotte

item.title: Trolley Pub Tour of Charlotte
item.description: Combine city sightseeing with a drinking experience you won’t soon forget during this Charlotte Trolley Pub Crawl Tour—perfect for travelers who like to stay active while having fun. A guide plans a route through Charlotte’s Uptown area based on riders requests and then makes two to three stops for the group. This experience is great for avoiding crowds and keeps you from having to walk the distance you cover.

image.alt: Trolley Pub Tour of Charlotte

item.title: Charlotte Haunted Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour
item.description: Uncover the sordid history of Charlotte, North Carolina as you embark on a walking tour and pub crawl through the historic district. Listen to your guide recount spooky stories of Charlotte's ghosts while you explore the area. This tour stops at several bars, where you can purchase drinks, as well as landmarks like the Dunhill Hotel and Old Settlers Cemetery.

image.alt: Charlotte Haunted Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour

item.title: Charlotte's Premier Historical City Bus Tour
item.description: Whether it’s your first time visiting Charlotte or if you’ve loved returning to North Carolina’s Queen City, this shared tour of the city will delight. Hop into a van with a few other friendly visitors and cruise around the city on this guided tour. You’ll pass by some of the hallmark sites around downtown, learning about the history, culture, and sports scene in Charlotte.

image.alt: Charlotte's Premier Historical City Bus Tour

item.title: Charlotte's Only Southern Charm Haunted/True Crime Golf Cart Tour
item.description: See the (allegedly) haunted sights of Charlotte with a guide to tell you all about the city’s history, from ghostly tales to true crime. You’ll travel through the night in an open-air golf cart, so you’ll see more and get around faster than you would on foot. Your tour guide can’t wait to show you around and give you a good scare.

image.alt: Charlotte's Only Southern Charm Haunted/True Crime Golf Cart Tour

item.title: The Original Charlotte Brewery Tour - Craft Beer Experience
item.description: Head out for an evening of drinking and dining with this immersive beer tour. You'll visit four different local breweries, where you'll get to sample craft beer and learn about the brewing process. This tour also includes a stop for a meal at Midwood Smokehouse.

image.alt: The Original Charlotte Brewery Tour - Craft Beer Experience

item.title: Historic Charlotte City Adventure Tour: by Vintage Car
item.description: Our tours stand out due to our extensive global experience in tourism and hospitality, ensuring that every aspect of the experience is crafted with excellence. We are committed to continuous improvement and innovation, driven by a clear vision for delivering exceptional experiences to our guests. What truly sets us apart are our unique carts, which are unlike any others you've likely encountered—cool, stylish, fancy, and exceptionally comfortable. As pioneers in this business, we have set the standard for quality and luxury, providing our guests with unforgettable journeys that exceed their expectations.

image.alt: Historic Charlotte City Adventure Tour: by Vintage Car

item.title: Dead Funny Ghost Tour Of Charlotte
item.description:
LaZoom's original purple bus is rolling into Charlotte this December! The Charlotte Ghosted Tour is no ordinary ghost tour—it’s a rolling theatre show packed with humor, spooky history, and thrilling surprises. This is one of the top Charlotte tours that combines professional actors, hilarious storytelling, and real haunted locations to create a one-of-a-kind adventure for locals and tourists alike.
LaZoom has been operating comedy and beer tours in Asheville NC since 2008 - be one of the first to experience it in Charlotte!
Ages 17+ ONLY. Parties of 16 or more - please call for availability.

image.alt: Dead Funny Ghost Tour Of Charlotte

item.title: Charlotte Historic : Queen Bee City Tour
item.description:
Relax on Charlotte's only large heated air electric shuttle. You will comfortably enjoy while exploring the Southern Charms of the City’s 4 Wards. We will stop along the way and take photos of the cities top attractions. [Panthers Stadium, Charlotte Hornets Arena, Historic 4th Ward, Discovery Place and more...]Our amazing Tour Guides will enrich you and your friends with fun entertaining facts & history of Charlotte.
Tours are not private. Private Tour Pickup/Drop-off can arranged for Uptown central Business District groups 9 or more with a 48hour advance request. Call for more info

image.alt: Charlotte Historic : Queen Bee City Tour

item.title: Sea Life Charlotte Concord Aquarium Admission Ticket
item.description: Slip beneath the surface with tickets to the Sea Life Charlotte–Concord Aquarium, and meet the thousands of mammals, bright fish and seahorses that thrive in dozens of exhibits that recreate the ecosystems that surround North Carolina. Get a fish eye’s-view of the marine landscape as you walk through an underwater ocean tunnel. Spot all eight legs on the Giant Pacific Octopus, see a feeding frenzy and explore the slippery world of jellyfish in soaring cylindrical tanks.

image.alt: Sea Life Charlotte Concord Aquarium Admission Ticket

item.title: Charlotte Indoor Skydiving Experience with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate
item.description: Book the skydiving, skip the airplane jump with this indoor skydiving experience in Charlotte. Those with a fear of heights can still feel the thrill of skydiving in this windtunnel-based activity; no terrifying plane jumps necessary. You’ll have an instructor by your side the whole time over the course of two jumps, and all equipment and instruction is included.

image.alt: Charlotte Indoor Skydiving Experience with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate

item.title: Big Bite Brew Tour in Charlotte's LoSo District
item.description: Welcome to the Big Bite Brew Tour, where we're taking Charlotte's culinary scene by storm, one mouthwatering bite and refreshing sip at a time! Join us on a delectable journey through the Loso district as we explore four local breweries, each offering a unique flavor profile and a tantalizing array of appetizers to tantalize your taste buds. Led by a professional travel photographer and seasoned local guide, this immersive experience promises not just great food and brews, but also memorable snapshots of your adventure to cherish forever. With easy walks between stops along flat sidewalks, additional tasty treats along the way, and the option to purchase more food and drinks at each location, there's something for everyone on this flavorful excursion. So come hungry, come thirsty, and get ready to indulge in the best of Charlotte's culinary delights on the Big Bite Brew Tour!

image.alt: Big Bite Brew Tour in Charlotte's LoSo District

item.title: Private Picnic Experience in the Queen City
item.description: Enjoy a picnic with a special someone when you’re in the Queen City of Charlotte. When you arrive at First Ward Park, your representative will be there to take you to the picnic location, where all will be set up for you. You’ll have views of Uptown Charlotte, while you can picnic, and do some activities to help you reconnect and relax with your dining partner.

image.alt: Private Picnic Experience in the Queen City

item.title: "In The Streets & Eats" Mural Art Tour Of Charlotte
item.description:
Cruising Through Uptown Charlotte
Dive into the vibrant soul of Queen City like never before with our exclusive summer Mural Tour! Immerse yourself in the city's iconic street art culture and feel the creative energy pulsing through the streets.
Our knowledgeable drivers will provide you with local insights, sharing details on the artists, hidden meanings, and inspirations behind each masterpiece.
Don't forget your cameras! Get ready to snap some insta-worthy pics against the backdrop of Charlotte's most stunning murals.
After the tour, head over to the Market at 7th Street for delicious food and beverages, as well as the perfect souvenir to remember your experience.
Book your spot now and get ready for an unforgettable adventure through the colorful streets of Queen City!
ALSO PLEASE INFORM THAT YOU AND YOUR GUEST WILL BE RIDING AT YOUR OWN RISK.

image.alt: "In The Streets & Eats" Mural Art Tour Of Charlotte

item.title: The Escape Game Concord: 60-Minute Adventures at Concord Mills
item.description:
Our location at Concord Mills is right by countless eating and retail options, perfect for pairing an escape room with a day or night out. Some of our fave places to eat include On The Border and Razzoo's Cajun Cafe.
The Escape Game Concord features 5 unique themes including The Depths, one of our newest escape rooms, and Prison Break, our most challenging game. Each family-friendly option includes multiple rooms and can hold up to 8 players, except for Playground, which can hold up to 12 players.
These adventures offer a one-of-a-kind premium experience. Follow clues and solve puzzles to complete your mission together. We offer the best escape rooms and the fastest customer support. Come see why our escape rooms win awards.

image.alt: The Escape Game Concord: 60-Minute Adventures at Concord Mills

item.title: Charlotte's Ultimate Southern Charm Historical City Bus Tour
item.description: Discounted parking when available. Tours leave promptly! Take a 5-star/award winning tour deep into our history on luxurious bus to see why people are saying Southern Charm Rides is #1 historical tour in Charlotte, southern hospitality, food discount, etc. We stop at each location for pictures. We give historical information dating back to the 1700s. Learn where Elvis performed, the name Queen City, Fourth Ward neighborhood, gold mining, arts, and tales throughout the cities' history. You will learn about the “medicine man,” the first hospital, the Bootlegger house, etc. For sports fans, Bank of America Stadium, Truist Ball Field, NASCAR Hall of Fame, etc. We travel down the Main Street showing you art, museums, and many landmarks. Don’t just take our word for it, read our reviews! Our tours have been the highlight of the trip for many travelers. Also, see our Southern Charm Haunted/true crime tour! Our tour is a great experience for everyone of all ages!

image.alt: Charlotte's Ultimate Southern Charm Historical City Bus Tour

item.title: Charlotte Brewery Crawl Tour
item.description: Charlotte is known for its thriving brewery scene, and this fun-filled tour offers a one-of-a-kind way to explore it. Meet your private guide at a convenient starting point, and get ready to sip your way around town. Traveling by golf cart, you can leave the navigation to someone else as you choose which three Charlotte breweries you'd like to visit. Then, have the freedom to order the brews that interest you most (own expense).

image.alt: Charlotte Brewery Crawl Tour

item.title: Uptown Charlotte: A Self-Guided Audio Tour to the Heart of Queen City
item.description: Immerse yourself in Uptown Charlotte's vibrant history and explore at your own pace on this self-guided audio tour. Discover the untold tales of Charlotte's fearless patriots, including the controversial story of how North Carolina declared independence before the rest of the colonies. Hosted by an actor and tour guide, Phil Biedron, this tour offers complete flexibility and control over your exploration. Spend two hours uncovering hidden gems, taking your time at each stop.

image.alt: Uptown Charlotte: A Self-Guided Audio Tour to the Heart of Queen City

item.title: Wild Things Rydables Tour of Charlotte
item.description: We will entertain your entire family from toddlers to grandparents on a fun tour of Charlotte. We start with a training session so that customers can get used to driving the Rydables. Afterwards, we will take off on a one-of-a-kind exploration of the city. You will not be able to stop smiling as you roll around learning about Charlotte’s Past & Present.

image.alt: Wild Things Rydables Tour of Charlotte
